p: In addition, from a physicochemical point of view, essential oils leave no residue or waste in the treated products and are easily biodegradable [ 44]. They are, therefore, potentially eligible for the development of new classes of insecticides combining efficiency and protection of the environment [ 45, 46]. Regarding application in storage warehouses, one of the most appreciated properties of essential oils is their fumigant activity against insects, since their involvement can be successful without having to apply the compound directly to the insects [ 9].
